titleStmt.title: Some queries proposed to the bishops and ministers of England, for them, or any of them, to answer that there may be an understanding why persecution is so violently prosecuted / [by] W.S.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England)
